ygData.subject: Re: third tinkering book
ygData.msgSnippet: Solusek s Eye is home to a pretty large population of gnomes which I think is the Solusek Mining Company. I think they might know something about tinkering
ygData.messageBody:
Solusek's Eye is home to a pretty large population of gnomes which I think
is the Solusek Mining Company. I think they might know something about
tinkering because there is one merchant there that sells a tinkerer's bag, I
don't know what the bag does because I just don't have the 5600 platinum he
wants for it. I can't find anything to say to get him to talk to me. I know
there's another gnome with a name in the room just across from the merchant
but unfortunately she isn't always there and I would have to destroy a
clockwork to get her to spawn which I am personaly opposed to and when she
does show up she doesn't live long because she carries a much sought after
cloak so I haven't gotten a chance to talk to her. I got the info about the
bait second hand so I don't know the name of the person who found the book
to get a screenshot or even give him credit. I was told he is going to post
the recipes so whoever you are if you're reading this please hurry!

> From: Ioshua <ioshua@...>
>
> Thank you much for the hint you were given. I'll try that as soon as
> I log in. Why exactly do you think it's in Solusek's Eye? What a
> horrid place to hide something like that. Tho, on second thought it's
> not a bad idea. Keep the good stuff for the brave. As I understand
> it there is a way to tailor snakeskin gear. I met someone who's
> friend made some. Of course, that and the bait could be either lucky
> finds or false alltogether.
>
